title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.14 - Town of Niagara
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.14 - Town of Niagara

State Regulations
(a) Route 182. The northbound and southbound roadways of Porter Road, Route 182, between IR
190 and Niagara Falls Boulevard, Route 62. (b) Packard Road. The northeastbound and
southwestbound roadways of Packard Road between the Niagara Expressway, IR 190
northbound off-ramp, and a point 700+- feet southwest of the northbound
off-ramp; provided, however, that this route is designated as an access highway
for use by tandem trailer combinations and by vehicles up to 102 inches in
width only, and is not hereby designated as an access highway for
tractor-semitrailer combinations with an overall length greater than 55 feet
with a 48-foot trailer or greater than 60 feet with a 45- foot
trailer. (c) Packard Road. Packard

Road between I-190 and Route 182, Porter Road. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8129.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
